<template>
	
		
</template>
<style>
	
</style>
<script>

import Vue from 'vue';
import VueResource from 'vue-resource';
import { Lazyload } from 'vant';
import { Swipe, SwipeItem } from 'vant';
import Router from "../../router/router";
Vue.use(Swipe);
Vue.use(SwipeItem);
Vue.use(VueResource);
Vue.use(Lazyload);

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      images: [],
    };
  },
	methods: {
		
	},
	created () {
	  this.$http.get("https://api.rezhuangzi.com/api/shop/index").then((response) => {
	    if(response.status == 200){
				this.images = response.body.data.banner;
				
			}
	  }, (error) => {
	    console.log('error:', error)
	  })
	}
};
</script>
<style>
  .my-swipe .van-swipe-item {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 20px;
    text-align: center;
		border-radius:1rem;
		height:100%;
		max-height:189px;
  }
	.my-swipe .van-swipe-item img{
		width:100%;
		height:100%;
	}
	#swipe_img{
		border-radius:1rem;
		overflow: hidden;
		width:489px;
		max-width:489px;
		margin:0 auto;
		cursor: pointer;
	}
</style>
